notesStmt.note: Transcribed from digital images contributed to the Internet Archive by the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign.

sourceDesc.bibl: Chicago Foreign Language Press Survey, 1936-1941, Works Projects Administration, Chicago Public Library Omnibus Project

revisionDesc.change: Initial TEI transcription from PanGeo Partners, Inc.

body.p: The following Scandinavians bought or sold real estate in Chicago recently:
Jane Gordon to Burton Hansen: Pratt Avenue, corner Southport Avenue. Price, $16,000.
Julia C. Griefen to Oscar H. Haugan: Lakewood and Morse Avenues. Price, $23,000.
Herman Evendsen to Nils A. Evendsen: Eric and Armour Streets. Price, $9,000.
A. A. Scowley to Emma Knudsen: Ewing and Blue Island Avenues. Price, $10,000.
T. E. Sullivan to Enock W. Johnsen: Polk Street and Homan Avenue. Price, $1,100.
T. E. Sullivan to Carl L. Petersen: Polk Street and Homan Avenues. Price, $1,100.
Ernest C. Nelson to William Gilow: Trumbull Avenue and 18th Street. Price, $6,700.
Erik Berg to Anna Novak: Rockwell Street and Wabansia Avenue. Price, $2,700.
Jens Hansen to Marie Hansen: Aberdeen and Sixtieth Streets. Price, $1,200.
